snippet: E! has ordered a reality series called "Mrs. Eastwood & Company" which will focus on Mr. Eastwood's wife, Dina, and their daughters, Francesca and Morgan, as well as an all-male singing group called Overtone that Mrs. Eastwood manages.
abstract: E! has ordered a reality series called "Mrs. Eastwood & Company" which will focus on Mr. Eastwood's wife, Dina, and their daughters, Francesca and Morgan, as well as an all-male singing group called Overtone that Mrs. Eastwood manages.

headline.main: Day Made: Clint Eastwood's Wife Gets a Reality Series
